name: Prayers for light
description:
Edit: I've uploaded the correct files, so it's playable now!

Feel free to come with all the feedback you want to! The more, the better

Hello everyone!

I'm a Danish guy, who loves to develop video games. I'm currently attending a school here in Denmark, where we learn to develop games!

Some friends and I have our own little Game Jam every week called "Game A Week", where we have one week to develop a game within a given theme (this is week number two!).

Thank you for taking a look at my game! I truly appreciate it!

If you want to see some of my other games, then here's a link for my Itch.io page: https://funkyhippo.itch.io/

I've downloaded a few things from the internet, so check the creators out if you like what they made:

THE FONT USED:

- Linguistics pro

By Stefan Peev

http://www.1001fonts.com/linguistics-pro-font.html

BACKGROUND MUSIC:

- Dark Choir Music | (Download And Royalty FREE)

By Mattia Cupelli

Shortened by Troels Jensen

CLICKING SOUND:

- click_01

By Joe DeShon, under the CC laws

http://www.freesound.org/people/joedeshon/sounds/2...
